blog.name: ao3feednamjin
blog.title: *winkwonk*
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

summary: Everything of me belongs to you
title: Everything of me belongs to you

title: Kim Namjoon (RM):
body:
Jin | Suga | J-Hope | RM | Jimin | V | Jungkook

Namjoon is the leader of the Bangtan Coven, and is the most powerful of the seven vampires. He is the only vampire who can erase memories, and so he was designated the role of leader because of this supernatural advantage that can keep them all safe. He is responsible, level-headed and very smart; less cunning like Seokjin and more intellectual. Namjoon loves reading, and spends a lot of his time in the local library/bookshop. He also loves studying humans, but from a distance, usually hidden behind the glass windows with Jimin, or buried in a book. As the leader, it is Namjoon’s responsibility to look after the Coven, and maintain its survival. He is in charge of finding suitable food sources, and always looks after the other vampires. He is the first person any of them go to if they’re in trouble, and he nearly always knows what to do. Just occasionally though, the stress of protecting six other people, and the pressures of hiding his true identity, Namjoon breaks down and has to say “I don’t know”. But a good leader is nothing without support, and while he is the solid rock propping up the Coven, the other vampires are always ready to prop Namjoon up when he needs it.

title: Travelling with Jungkook
body:
Summary: Mini headcanon
Warnings: None
Little fluff, mostly crack

New York City, New York

  • He came up with the idea of travelling somewhere out of Korea
  • Mostly as a way to get out and rest
  • But more so to spend time away with you since he had been working for so long
  • Wanted to go to a big city where he could explore
  • You came up with the idea of New York because you wanted to go for so long
  • “What about New York?”
  • “It’s that a little far for a small trip?”
  • “Kook it’ll be so fun!”
  • He doesn’t need much convincing
  • Any excuse to spend time with you
  • And any excuse to take loads of photos of you together
  • Or just candid photos of you
  • He would buy hotdogs at literally every stop
  • Time Square “They’re on every block!”
  • Central Park “yn! More hotdogs!”
  • Outside Empire State building “This one sells cookies too!”
  • “Jeon Jungkook you’re on your sixth hotdog and it’s not even 11AM!”
  • “Yeah… And what?”
  • He’d mumble taking another bite of the seventh
  • When it starts to get dark and cold
  • He’ll take you to a small coffee shop in Brooklyn and buy you cute little pastries and hot chocolate
  • Give you his jacket
  • Even though he’s in only a shirt
  • Then wander over Brooklyn Bridge as it begins to snow
  • He would drag you back through Central Park just as an excuse to go ice skating
  • Would try and show you up
  • Starts doing the dance routine of ‘Fire’
  • Straight up falls on his ass and causes the majority of the rink to crack up in fits of laughter
  • except you
  • You just watch lovingly as he looks you and you innocently
  • How did I deserve such a meme of a loving boyfriend?
body_abstract:

Warnings: None

summary: Seeing them come up is such a moment to be proud of. Three years ago, I saw them performing on a much smaller stage than this...
body: Seeing them come up is such a moment to be proud of. Three years ago, I saw them performing on a much smaller stage than this but fast forward, here they are at the staples center, performing in front of thousands and thousands of fans. It’s so crazy. It’s so amazing to have been a part of seeing them rise up and dominate the world with all of their hard work. 💜

reblog.comment: Seeing them come up is such a moment to be proud of. It’s so amazing to have been a part of seeing them rise up and dominate the world with all of their hard work. 💜

summary:
You know whats better than books? Fanfiction
You know what's better than ao3 fanfiction? Twitter au threads 
Ive been spending...
body:
You know whats better than books? Fanfiction

You know what’s better than ao3 fanfiction? Twitter au threads

Ive been spending my whole days reading taekook au threads even in class someone save me Im soft I read a whole 36k thread yesterday and some others

This is what happens when the yuumika ao3 section is dry

summary: i’m back! and i saw bts in london on the 10th. it was truly an amazing experience and these boys mean everything in the world to...
body: i’m back! and i saw bts in london on the 10th. it was truly an amazing experience and these boys mean everything in the world to me. it was wonderful and euphoric to finally see the boys that saved my life after three years. thank you, bts !

reblog.comment: i’m back! and i saw bts in london on the 10th. it was truly an amazing experience and these boys mean everything in the world to me. it was wonderful and euphoric to finally see the boys that saved my life after three years. thank you, bts !
